sentence: The latest from the campaign trail House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Bakersfield) endorsed the GOP primary challenger to Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney on Thursday, his latest show of fealty to former President Trump as Republicans try to take control of Congress, Seema Mehta reported.
title: Democrats' divide: Voters of color and white liberals diverge on crime

author: Laura Blasey
title: Today's Headlines: A new poll finds that L.A. isn't as unpopular as you might think
